You press cut and in an instant she is gone and the screen on the remote loads up, you aim it at the ground and press paste she reappears and walks away as if nothing happend. You think about what you can do with it! You use it on...

1131.content:
As you finished your chat with Monica, you were ready to continue your daily jog. As your body started to move forward, you seemed to be pulled away from it. An invisible hand seemed to be pulling you away. You wanted to scream out as you saw your body disappear from view, but you could not say a single word.

Looking around your new setting, you appeared to be trapped in some small TV remote being carried by Monica's neighbor. Specifically, one of the boys. He carried you back into the house and walked up the stairs into what you could only presume was his room.

What was he doing with you? He looked nervous with his eyes darting around. He then pointed you straight at himself. Then in an instant, you found you could move again. You were free from the remote, but everything felt very different. In your new hands was the remote you were just trapped in. You looked in the mirror and saw the boy who was just holding you looking back.

121.content: Your old body aims the remote at your baby brother who is playing with a toy in his room. Your old body presses "Paste" You feel yourself being shot across the room and into your baby brother. You take his body. You look around, stunned that it actually worked, You are in the body of your baby brother! You are holding a toy and are wearing nothing but a diaper with some characters on it. Your old self gives you the remote and walks away. You need to go to the bathroom, so you happily use your diaper knowing that you wont have to wear it for very long. Your mother walks in and picks you up, "Someone needs a change!" She prepares to change you, you press "Cut" and you are taken out of your brothers body and put into the remote. Your baby brother holds the remote at your mother and presses paste. You merge with your mother and you see your brother become himself again. You take the remote and walk across the house to yourself, you press "cut" and you are sucked into the remote, your old body picks up the remote and aims it at itself, you are shot back into your old body.

121121.content:
You decide that being your brother might not be so bad - it was good the first time, and you know you would be able to change back at any time. So you go back to your baby brother, press 'Cut' - with the now-familiar feeling of being sucked into the remote - and are pasted into his body. The diaper you are now wearing is fresh, warm and very soft.

Your old body gives you the remote and leaves. Now you are alone in your brother's light blue room, a stack of diapers to the right on the baby-print dresser next to a changing table; your new crib to the left - mobile hanging; brightly coloured plastic toys and blocks covering the distance between. Excited, you try to go over to the toys, but to your dismay, find you can't walk any more.

You decide to crawl instead, but when you make it your mother comes back in. She sees you with the remote, which you had been holding, and asks, non-witholding the childish voice, 'Sweetie, where'd you get that? Is that your brother's?' Your mother takes the remote off you - you try to protest, but are unable to make an impression - and leaves the room momentarily, returning without it - you're now effectively trapped as your baby brother.

She picks you up and, as you are lifted, a distinct rumbling come from your bowels. That's on its way, you're stuck as your baby brother, possibly indefinitely, and your mother's taking you to...

122111.content:
You decide that you could do it, you walk out into the day-care, you begin playing with a toy. A girl about your age walks up to you. She looks at you and asks "Can I play with you?" you look at her and without a thought blurt out "Sure!" She sits down with you, you both play for a while, while you were alone it was pretty boring but with her it was very fun! You continue playing until your arms are tired. The young girl looks at you, you look back at her. "That was fun!!" she says, just then you see a woman walk up behind her,

"Hi Sara!"

The little girl runs into her arms,

"Mommy! I met this nice boy!!" The mother looks at you,

"So, whats your name?" You look back and realize that you don't know the boys name! Just then you hear a voice behind you.

"His name is Tommy!" You turn around and look up at a woman,

"Im his mother, were they playing?"

"Yep! It sounds like they were having loads of fun!"

"Are you okay if they have a little play date at your house, I have some things to do..."

"Oh! Sure, why not!"

The girls mother takes your hand and walks the two of you out to her car. She straps you and Sara into carseats and begins driving, Sara smiles and looks at you, you smile and look back at her and then you realize it. You are in love with a 4 year old girl! Normally that would seem a bit wierd, but it didn't seem so now that you are also 4. Soon the car drives up to a modest house, the mother gets out and unstraps you both and lets you inside. You look around for a minute and then hear Sara calling, "Come over here! This is my room!" you walk into a pink room with stickers of princesses on the walls and toys everywhere. She holds your hand and gives you a tour of it. "This is my bed, this is my toy animal, oh! oh! And THIS is my favorite princess!! You are amazed at the size of everything. Then she and you sit down, so what is your room like, huh? You look back at her having no idea what the boys room looks like. "Umm...Its got lots of toys..." You manage to say. "COOL!" she happily responds, then she frowns, "Ill be right back!" She walks across the hall to a bathroom, and closes the door. You walk up to the bathroom curious as to what shes doing. You peep through the crack in the door. You see her takes off her skirt to reveal her pink pull-up, and then she preceded to change herself. This reminded you that you were in love with a girl who still wears pull-ups and belives in fairy tales. You walk back into her room and sit down on her bed. She soon returns happy as ever. For some reason you couldn't help but ask,

"So you wear pull-ups?"

She frowns, "of course!" she lifts up her skirt and pokes her pull-up, "Don't you?"

It reminded you that you also were wearing a pull-up, "Uhh, yeah..."

"You're lying!!"

For some odd reason you felt the need to prove her wrong, you pulled down your pants to reaveal your dark blue pull-up,

"Ok, fine..."

Then you hear her mother calling "Tommy, its time to go" you walk out of her room and into the kitchen to your "Mom" and Sara's mom talking, your mom looks at you and says

"Do you want to stay her for the night?"

For some odd reason you immediatly smile and say "YES!!!!!"

"Ok, you're here for the night!"

You run around and play with Sara for another hour before her mom announces bedtime, you and her climb into her bed and fall into a deep sleep....

"I don't understand, why couldn't we just do this at your house?" Henry said, not enjoying being out in public.

info.brief_description: A story about a person who finds a remote.
info.description:
One day you find a remote, it has 3 buttons:

-Cut: Takes a person and their body and loads it into the remote

-Copy: Takes a copy of a person and loads it onto the remote, but leaves a copy inside their body

-Paste: Takes the person that has been loaded onto the remote and merges them with another person or an object

Rules:

- Sex is ok as long as it is not too descriptive
- try to keep new chapters long
